casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Melvin Lamar FIELDS 170A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 6, 2019 Richard Croutharmel, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Fields, Melvin Lamar. Lisa Bradley, Assistant Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of May 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of May 2019."
